channel.title: Cldr on PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content in Cldr on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: CLDR, Composer, NPM, JSHint, oh my!
item.description: As those of you who regularly look at the commits being merged in the ‘develop’ branch know, the forthcoming 1.7.0.0 version of PrestaShop now includes a few notable improvements.
